Html:
Is it possible to put additional buttons together with a FontControl into the same ribbon group? Since the current version of the ribbon framework doesn't feature dialog box launchers I need an extra button to open a character format dialog. It would be nice to be able to put that next to a FontControl element.

So far I haven't been able to manage this. No matter what I do (e. g. using a custom GroupSizeDefinition or not setting a group size definition at all) I get unhelpful errors concerning the SizeDefinition "IntRichFont" which seems to be an internal part of the FontControl control.
